GEOLOCATION_PERMISSION_DENIED: Onze toegang is geweigerd. Heb je de applicatie toegang gegeven tot je locatie?
GEOLOCATION_POSITION_UNAVAILABLE: We konden je locatie niet vinden. Is je GPS geactiveerd?
REQUESTS_EMPTY_DISCLAIMER_NEEDER: Help is closer than you think.
REQUESTS_EMPTY_DISCLAIMER_HELPER: Thank you for volunteering to help out! We’ll sent you a notification when someone is in need of help!

REQUESTS_REQUEST_PENDING_CANCEL_CONFIRM_: Are you sure you want to cancel your request?
REQUESTS_REQUEST_ACCEPTED_TITLE_NEEDER: {{name}} has agreed to help you out! Call them or send a message to tell them what you need!
REQUESTS_REQUEST_ACCEPTED_TITLE_HELPER: You’ve agreed to help {{name}}. Call them or send a message to understand what they need!
INTRO_TITLE: Heel erg bedankt voor je bijdrage
SIGNIN_TITLE: Schrijf je in met een sociaal profiel naar keuze
CONSENTS_TITLE: Ik ga akkoord met de onderstaande uitspraken voor nu en toekomstig gebruik van de app
CONSENTS_SYMPTOMS: Ik heb geen symptomen van COVID-19 (hoesten, koorts, ademtekort, enz.).
CONSENTS_TRAVEL: Ik heb het land in de afgelopen 14 dagen niet verlaten.
CONSENTS_CONTACT: I have not come in contact with anyone suspected of being infected or sick in the past 14 days.
CONSENTS_SOCIAL: I have been practising social distancing.
PROFILE_SETUP_TITLE: We just need a few things to set you up.
PROFILE_SETUP_HELPER_TITLE: Thank you for helping your local community.
PROFILE_SETUP_TERMS_CONFIRM: I have read and agree with the <0>terms of service</0>
PROFILE_SETUP_PRIVACY_POLICY_CONFIRM: I understand and consent to the collection and use of my personal information, including my Health Data, as described in the <0>privacy policy</0>

SPONSORS_REACH_OUT: Reach out if your company can help.
